channel.title: Network connection when gateway is not started
channel.description: When the gateway was not started "update" and "full-upgrade" was still working. There were only some messages that the download of some files was not successful.

item.title: Network connection when gateway is not started
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
You can post here but detailed steps how to reproduce it and the different looking logs would be required. Otherwise impossible to know what’s going on here on my side.

Read full topic
item.source: Network connection when gateway is not started

item.title: Network connection when gateway is not started
item.dc:creator: thomasvatter
item.description:
In the documentation I found that I should report the bug to the Whonix discourse forums. Where in the forums should I report the bug?

Read full topic
item.source: Network connection when gateway is not started

item.title: Network connection when gateway is not started
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Without more details, I am not convinced there is any leak here. This applies:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Reporting_Bugs#Support_Request_Policy

See also:

Whonix – 13 Aug 22

Leak Tests

Major leak tests for for IP/DNS Leaks. How to check if this application is leaking? How likely that application is leaking? Unsuitable Tests: Location Detection, Operating System Detection.

Read full topic

item.title: Network connection when gateway is not started
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Which virtualizer?

In that case, please report a bug as per:

Whonix – 12 Aug 22

Bug Reports, Software Development and Feature Requests

How to Report (Security) Bugs in the Whonix ™ Operating System. Software development cycle, patches, and responsiveness to feedback and feature requests.

And also please share the logs Whonix-Gateway shutdown versus disconnect internet.

Read full topic
item.source: Network connection when gateway is not started

item.title: Network connection when gateway is not started
item.dc:creator: thomasvatter
item.description:
Patrick:

To test, you can completely disconnect your computer from the internet and probably still get the same error messages.

When I completely disconnect from the internet the output shows no downloads. The update does not proceed. There is only a message: Trying to connect.

Read full topic
item.source: Network connection when gateway is not started

item.title: Network connection when gateway is not started
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
thomasvatter:

if it is only a problem with the output messages.

Much more likely so. To test, you can completely disconnect your computer from the internet and probably still get the same error messages.

Read full topic
item.source: Network connection when gateway is not started

item.title: Network connection when gateway is not started
item.dc:creator: thomasvatter
item.description:
The applications are starting, that’s OK. The output showed that most of the files were downloaded. The question is, if the files were really downloaded or if it is only a problem with the output messages.

Read full topic
item.source: Network connection when gateway is not started

item.title: Network connection when gateway is not started
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
thomasvatter:

When the gateway was not started “update” and “full-upgrade” was still working.

Expected. Whonix-Gateway not being started does not disrupt any applications inside Whonix-Workstation, except…

thomasvatter:

There were only some messages that the download of some files was not successful.

…there is no networking available inside Whonix-Workstation if Whonix-Gateway is not running.

So seems all working as expected?

Read full topic
item.source: Network connection when gateway is not started
